short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly analyze all links on a webpage, scan for empty links, and identify unique links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linkflow is a 1-click tool for analyzing and visualizing all links on any webpage

• Instant Site Analysis
- See all links on any webpage at a glance
- Quickly identify navigation issues and broken links
- Find duplicate links that might confuse users
- Export findings to CSV for team sharing

• Smart Visual Feedback
- Links highlight directly on the page as you work
- Click any link in your results to jump to its location
- Color-coded highlighting makes issues easy to spot

• Designed for Efficiency
- Clean, minimal interface that stays out of your way
- One-click scanning for faster workflow
- Automatic theme matching with your system
- Zero configuration needed

Perfect for:
• Web Developers checking site structure
• Content Managers auditing navigation
• SEO Specialists analyzing link architecture
• QA Teams hunting for broken links
• Anyone who needs to understand website organization

Get started with just one click - no complex setup or learning curve. Linkflow helps you work smarter, not harder.
